document_data.name: ''Earring of Prince Mamoon''
document_data.mainbody: The '''''Earring of Prince Mamoon''''' was an item that could be found in [[Zakhara]], the Land of Fate.
document_data.Description: These pieces of jewelry were hoops of jet coral covered with intricate calligraphy.
document_data.Powers: These earrings were fashioned by Prince [[Mamoon]] of the [[marid]]s. He created them for his students of ''marqab'', a school for [[sha'ir]]s in [[Gana]]. Anyone who presented one of these earrings gained acceptance into the school.
